articles.author: Giselle Wakatama
articles.title: Jury in Jarryd Hayne rape trial says it's unable to reach unanimous verdict - ABC News
articles.description: The former NRL star has pleaded not guilty to two counts of aggravated sexual assault, with Judge Peter Whitford urging jurors to keep deliberating.
articles.content:
The jury in the rape trial of former NRL star Jarryd Hayne has been urged to keep deliberating after announcing it has been unable to reach a unanimous verdict.
Key points:

articles.title: Warriors' request to train at home denied as club makes call to start NRL season in Australia - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Warriors' application for Aussie-based players to train in managed isolation, similar to the Wallabies, knocked back as wait continues for return to Mt Smart.
